title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematics Job English Speaking Motivation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement course for prospective/in-service teachers. Targets professionals requiring English math concept explanations in workplaces. Blends digital device (tablet/laptop) pre-learning with in-class activities

learning_goals: Learners can fluently explain the process of solving mathematical problems in English for 3 minutes or more.
Learners can pronounce and use job-related mathematical terminology with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can revise English presentation materials at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
